overview_of_class: This is a two hour weekly laboratory to be taken concurrently with Physics 130-1 or Physics 135-1. Enrollment in a lab is required when registered for a Physics 130 or 135 lecture. Topics include particle kinematics, Newtonian dynamics, work and energy, collisions and momentum, torque and angular momentum, rigid-body statics and dynamics, harmonic oscillations, and gravitation.
name: General Physics Laboratory
subject: PHYSICS
